description: This file implements CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for 'todo' items in a task management system, using SQLAlchemy ORM. It defines functions for retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and setting the completion status of todo items, interfacing with database models and schemas.

methods.name: get_todo(db: Session, todo_id: int)
methods.description: Retrieve a todo item by its ID.

methods.name: get_todos(db: Session, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100)
methods.description: Retrieve a list of todo items, with optional pagination.

methods.name: create_todo(db: Session, todo: schemas.TodoCreate)
methods.description: Create a new todo item in the database.

methods.name: update_todo(db: Session, todo_id: int, todo: schemas.TodoUpdate)
methods.description: Update an existing todo item identified by its ID.

methods.name: delete_todo(db: Session, todo_id: int)
methods.description: Delete a todo item by its ID.

methods.name: set_complete_status(db: Session, todo_id: int, complete: bool)
methods.description: Set the completion status (true/false) of a todo item.

ctags.name: get_todos
ctags.pattern: /^def get_todos(db: Session, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100):$/

ctags.name: set_complete_status
ctags.pattern: /^def set_complete_status(db: Session, todo_id: int, complete: bool):$/

ctags.name: update_todo
ctags.pattern: /^def update_todo(db: Session, todo_id: int, todo: schemas.TodoUpdate):$/
